report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-22365 IBM WebSphere Application Server Vulnerability
Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-22365 IBM WebSphere Application Server Vulnerability
text: IBM WebSphere Application Server 7.0, 8.0, 8.5, and 9.0, with the Ajax Proxy Web Application (AjaxProxy.war) deployed, is vulnerable to spoofing by allowing a man-in-the-middle attacker to spoof SSL server hostnames.
